title: LA-19-03: Revised Compilation of Federal Ethics Laws Reflecting Legislation Enacted in the 115th Congress
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/EB15EBFA3243D812852585BA005BEC1F/$FILE/LA-19-03 Revised Compilation of Federal Ethics Laws Reflecting Legislation Enacted in the 115th Congress.pdf?open
summary: This Legal Advisory describes the changes in OGE’s updated Compilation of Federal Ethics Laws. The 115th Congress passed legislation affecting ethics and other government integrity statutes contained in the Compilation.
